backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue structures, activities, moments, letters, access control, and in‑memory maps for per‑user progress and profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented gameplay AI features to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their roles in UI, scenes, controls, state, and mini‑games.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for diagnosing and retrying failed IC deployments with quick steps and checks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark palette values, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide explaining IC canister uptime limits, availability checks, and steps to keep the backend running.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controller handling startup, screen navigation, backend checks, game launch logic, and diagnostics tracking.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Simple local‑only admin username gate with a configurable username and derived storage key.
Defines activity data including IDs, descriptions, trust effects, and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Manages background music playback and audio settings via a persisted Zustand store.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders the 3D Puro character with idle animation, hover effects, and dialogue-triggering click logic.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Implements mobile touch controls including joystick movement, look controls, and jump handling.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard and joystick input to produce movement and look values while respecting pause and terminal state.
Zustand store tracking joystick, look deltas, and one-shot jump requests with reset functionality.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Static list of customization items with descriptions and allowed placement locations.
Defines branching dialogue nodes with choices, trust effects, and optional trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/enemies/types.ts: Defines enemy state types and shared movement, detection, and visual constants.
frontend/src/game/enemies/WhiteLatexBeas: Implements an AI‑driven enemy that wanders, ambushes, and chases the player using Three.js and game constants.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game view that initializes the game, renders the 3D scene, HUD, overlays, and handles pause and mount events.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Provides keyword‑based letter response generation from friendly, curious, and encouraging templates.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Mini‑game where players sort books into categories, affecting trust and showing feedback.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: Mini‑game for viewing Puro’s drawings, tracking viewed items and adjusting trust.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: Timed mini‑game guessing Puro’s hiding spot with trust adjustments based on performance.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Launcher component that displays a menu and loads selected mini‑games.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a story moment with title, scene text, and close controls.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data objects with titles, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/HiveScene.tsx: Implements a hive exploration scene with movement, jump physics, enemy encounters, and transfur event handling.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the library scene with movement, jumping, camera control, proximity-based teleporting, and optional wood textures.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing game state, UI visibility, trust, activities, transfur events, scenes, and persistence.
frontend/src/game/state/useSettingsStore: Zustand store for persistent user settings, currently tracking aim sensitivity.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines available endings and selects one based on trust thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the final ending screen based on trust level with options to start a new game or return to the title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Activity selection UI that applies trust changes, completes activities, unlocks moments, and closes the menu.
Panel for placing discovered customization items in the library and viewing placed items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Renders a dialogue UI that displays the current dialogue node and filters choices based on trust, updating trust and navigation on selection.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Provides a letter-writing and inbox interface, validating input, sending letters, and generating delayed responses.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Shows a list of unlockable story moments and allows playing unlocked ones via a MomentPlayer component.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Implements the pause menu with navigation to activities, settings, letters, and admin tools, plus reset and resume actions.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Displays adjustable settings for audio volume, mute, and aim sensitivity with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TransfurOverlay.tsx: Shows a timed fade-in and fade-out overlay with a message before calling a completion callback.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays the player's trust level with a colored label and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health using the actor and provides availability status, timestamps, errors, and a refetch helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Also wraps AuthClient creation with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods like fetching game state and performing game actions, invalidating queries on mutations. Intended only for online gameplay.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining custom color variables for light and dark themes and applying base styling. Establishes global typography and background styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Runs one-time startup tasks such as checking localStorage availability and preloading critical assets. Provides utilities to run and reset startup state.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store implementing a local-only admin unlock gate using a username match and persistent storage. Supports unlocking and relocking admin mode.
Empty placeholder file for future server access state management.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for unlocking and managing local admin mode with feedback messages, using Zustand state. Includes warnings about its non-secure nature.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Credits and about screen with game description, features list, and external link attribution. Includes background styling and a back button.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Renders an admin-accessible in-game terminal overlay with input handling, output scrolling, and command execution.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays user‑friendly and technical details for game launch failures with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: Catches runtime rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with optional stack details and return-to-title action.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Shows backend server health as a colored status indicator based on availability state.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Parses and executes allowed diagnostic terminal commands, including app and server status queries.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic state into readable lines for terminal display.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility, input/output lines, and message logging.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Implements the game's title menu with launch options, admin tools, and server status/offline notices.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into user-friendly summaries with categorized error types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash params.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation detailing the app's startup sequence, initialization tasks, and extension instructions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and feature requests for implementing ambush-triggered chase behavior.
